pages.text: Pseudo is one of the new types of resources found in this world. $(br)We do not currently know how it got here, but we know that it can be used to $(#f00)"corrupt" $()certain blocks.
As implied, this is the Pseudo Ore. It can rarely be found deep underground in the Overworld.

This is the most common source of Pseudo. Scattered around the world are Geodes containing these little guys. $(br)Upon breaking one without a Silk Touch pickaxe, you will be rewarded a singular piece of dust.

Pseudo dust is the main product of smelting $(item)Pseudo Ore$() and the byproduct of destroying $(item)Pseudo Clusters$(). Since our smelting methods are still inefficient, it is recommended to keep the ore until more efficient ways of smelting and extracting are found. $(br)As for the clusters, unless mined carefully, they will always drop dust when broken.
